property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs
property.description: Comma separated list of paths. Use the list of directories from $YARN_LOCAL_DIR. For example, /grid/hadoop/hdfs/yarn,/grid1/hadoop/hdfs/yarn.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb
property.description: Minimum limit of memory to allocate to each container request at the Resource Manager.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb
property.description: Maximum limit of memory to allocate to each container request at the Resource Manager.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb
property.description: Physical memory, in MB, to be made available to running containers

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores
property.description: Number of CPU cores that can be allocated for containers.
